greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of triangle A134674.
comment: For n>1, a(n) = n^2 iff n is prime.
link: John Mason, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: a(n) = A007434(n) + A001065(n). - Conjectured by _John Mason_ and proved by _Max Alekseyev_, Jan 07 2015
example: a(4) = 15 = sum of row 4 terms of triangle A134674: (4, + 3 + 4 + 4).
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Nov 05 2007
